sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting"> <x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <code_url>https://slalosc2.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=sys_script_client.do?sys_id=8b248ef313812a00dd7db5b12244b0a4</code_url> <code_url_2/> <details/> <example_steps/> <example_url/> <module>e0b4d4b313892a00e5adbd522244b077,ca9494b313892a00e5adbd522244b05d</module> <number>SNSCRIPT0001041</number> <replaced_by/> <script>function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading, isTemplate) { if (isLoading || newValue === '') { return; } var phoneField = 'home_phone'; new HR_Utils_UI().validatePhoneNumberForField(newValue, isLoading, phoneField); }</script> <script_2/> <script_type>Client Script</script_type> <short_description>Validate Phone Number</short_description> <state>Submitted</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-08-12 02:13:38</sys_created_on> <sys_id>15b9a9f313412a00dd7db5b12244b076</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-08-14 02:35:55</sys_updated_on> <tested_on_helsinki/> </x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting> </record_update>
